name: Boss: Mini
description:
Welcome to the Dungeon of the Boss that is Mini. This is Team Lark's first foray into a Game Jam and while the game is a bit rough we learned a lot and had a lot of fun. Hope Boss: Mini brings you some joy. 

// Credits //
Coding: Birducken
Music: Airivol & TurboRLR
Sound Effects: TurboRLR
Art: Birducken & AngryMailman & crispyalmond

A Team Lark Production
